"Your stories are being created. We'll let you know when a new story is ready. Learn more"

When you use Location Sharing in Google+, you can let others know where you are in real-time and others can share their location with you.
"Let people know you're in town or on your way to an event. It makes meeting up easier. Learn more"
%s will see your precise, current location

Google needs to periodically store your location data to provide Location Sharing across Google products, and more. Learn more

People you share your location with can also see your places such as home and work.

Opting in turns on Location History for your Google Account and Location Reporting for this device.
